text: A summer school for? I've had a very busy week because it's nearly the end of term so Year 6 are very busy!

Sorry, I'm not getting notifications through on my phone all the time for some reason. I did English, Spanish and Chemistry; odd mix I know but I was badly advised on the Chemistry front. It's taken me a few years to work out what I want to do. I looked at going into law in my first year of uni but then I realised that it's all very glamorous and well paid etc etc but I'd be really bored. I need a job I enjoy and that means something so I tried out a few more things and then worked out that I liked tutoring so teaching might be a safe bet. I got a job as a graduate teaching assistant just to check I was making the right decision and it's been the best job I've ever had so teaching it is
